topic: Deep Learning: What Makes Networks 'Deep' and Powerful
lesson_structure: 1. Introduction & Recap (5 minutes)2. What Does 'Deep' Mean? (10 minutes)3. Why Go Deep? The Power of Abstraction (20 minutes)4. Key Ingredients for Deep Learning (15 minutes)5. Advantages & Challenges (5 minutes)6. Real-world Impact (5 minutes)
